description: <tenderDescription-descriptionAppelOffres-eng>Amendment 003This solicitation amendment is raised to:1. Provide clarification and answers to questions from potential suppliers; and2. Amend the solicitation (Annex A, Requirement – Statement of Work) to clarify and reflect the questions received.Amendment 002This solicitation amendment is raised to:1. Extend the solicitation closing date by 4 weeks from 8 November 2022 to 6 December 2022Amendment 001This solicitation amendment is raised to:1. Provide clarification and answers to questions from potential suppliers; and2. Amend the solicitation (Annex A, Requirement – Statement of Work) to clarify and reflect the questions received.File Number: W8476-226567/ANOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTThe Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure fifty-six (56) ISO Container Administrative Movement and Maintenance Systems (ICAMMS) and Integrated Logistics Support for delivery to multiple Canadian Forces Bases (CFB) across Canada. The requested delivery date for all the goods and services is 730 days.The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.This requirement uses electronic receipt of bids by e-mail only. For details, please review the section entitled Electronic Submission of Bids in the solicitation document.Bids must be submitted by e-mail only to:DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca
tags: ISO Container Administrative Movement and Maintenance Systems (ICAMMS)
